TopicTitle: Developers of mods, watch out for new parts stemming from real life.

Articles.Content:
On Reddit, for instance, there are lots of posts in /r/science and /r/technology that are about new jet, rocket, and other space based innovations.

Such as: http://www.wired.co.uk/news/archive/2013-09/10/inflatable-antennae-cubesats

This should be implemented, the guy who does ISAmapsats should really take into consideration doing this, it's just an interesting idea.

As I understand it the guy who did ISAmapsats isn't doing it anymore.

Has this changed? Is someone else taking it over?

But I agree with your premise. There are things that currently exist and things currently in testing that I would very much like to see in game. VASIMR comes to mind. Scram Jets come to mind as well.
